overview:
Steve Stein is an Information Architecture specialist and currently appointed CTO & CIO of Interti GmbH a Berlin based Start-Up that produces an individualized newspaper. In his position as Chief Technology Officer Mr. Stein develops the information technology strategy of the company. He supervises a Suisse development agency, plans international partnerships and organizes technical resources. Mr. Stein creates concepts for information architecture as well as strategies for online marketing and social media. He is responsible for all technical cooperations & technology partners and consults the board of executives in all technology related decisions. He promotes the further development and optimization of the product line for a seamless and integrated information architecture throughout multiple different platforms & devices.

Steve Stein is also available as a freelancer and consultant in the area of information architecture (IA), usability (UX), human computer interaction (HCI) and the semantic web (web 3.0) as well as social network analysis and search engine engineering (SEE) & optimization (SEO).

Mr. Stein is a former lecturer in digital media at the University of Applied Sciences in Kaiserslautern and a discussion panelist. His courses included Media Management and Production, Media Design Foundations and Media and Communications.
